short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get video requests made by a page so you can pop them out.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Many websites, mainly news and streaming, use video streams but will put ads, before, during and around the video.
WatchAlone will help you get control of these video stream and enable you with a tap of a button to watch it on your own terms, open it on a new tab or use the URL to view on your favourite streaming app on your own computer.
